pages.text: Type: Overhaul $(br)Tamable: Yes $(br)Chest-able: Yes $(br)Drops: Unicorn Meat, Leather, Unicorn Horn

Unicorns work much like O-Horses. They can be saddled, ridden, and use cosmetic items. However, different species of Unicorn can do different things. Unicorns also have much higher stats than horses, and can be killed for Unicorn Horns and meat.
